name: Anti Armor Ammunition
desc: Increases hit strength for armor damage reduction calculation of all weapons by %s but reduces damage to shield of all weapons by %s.

name: Bombardment Package
desc:
Package for precision orbital bombardment. Increases the effective strength of planetary raids by %s/%s/%s/%s depending on hull size, up to the total number of marines in the fleet, also reduces bombardment cost for the same amount.

Not compatible with Ground Support Package.

name: Emergency Venting System
desc:
If overload duration exceeds %s seconds, overload is shortened to %s seconds and engines are knocked out, when overload ends, ship immediately begins active venting.

Has no effect on ships that cannot use active venting.

name: Exploration Refit
desc:
A modification used by deep space exploration fleets, replaces parts of the ship militarized subsystems with ones that increases overall exploration performance.
Reduces fuel usage by %s, supplie use for maintenance by %s and increases sensor strength by %s.
Reduces maximum combat readiness by %s. And reduces combat readiness recovery rate by %s.
All effects reduced by %s if Efficiency Overhaul is installed.

name: Flux Booster
desc: Increases venting speed by %s (redused by %s if Resistant Flux Conduits is installed). While venting increases speed and maneuverability by %s/%s/%s/%s depending on the hull size and flux level at moment of venting start, for %s seconds or until ship stops venting whichever is faster.

name: Flux Overdrive
desc: Increase damage and flux cost of energy and ballistic weapons as flux level rise up to %s at max flux.

name: Fuel Additive
desc: Special additive for anti-material fuel increase its efficiency. Reduces fuel consumption by %s and increase maximum burn by %s. But increases maintenance by %s.

name: Hyper Engine Upgrade
desc:
Increases zero-flux engine boost when ship below %s flux, slower ships get greater effect.
Speed boost is: %s

name: Hullfoam Dispenser
desc: Repair ship's hull at rate of %s/%s/%s/%s max hull per second. Repairs limited to %s of base hull per combat.

name: Integrated Armor
desc: Increases minimum armor value by %s or by %s/%s/%s/%s depending on hull, whichever is lower.

name: Missile Prefabricator
desc:
Replaces missile autoloader with prefabricated ammo stores. Increases ammo capacity by equivalent of %s/%s/%s/%s second of ammo reload.

Does not affect weapons without magazines and build-in weapons.

name: Particle Accelerator
desc: Increases projectile travel speed of energy and ballistic weapons by %s.

name: Split Chamber
desc:
Increases fire rate, ammo reload speed and ammo cappacity of energy and ballistic weapons by %s.
Reduces flux generation of energy and ballistic weapons by %s.
Reduces damage of energy and ballistic weapons by %s.

name: Torpedo Spec
desc: Modify missiles propulsion system to be forward focused, increasing their speed by %s and hitpoints by %s, at the cost of reducing their maneuverability by %s.

name: Unstable Shields
desc: Overcharges shield projectors with energy, reducing shield damage taken by %s for %s seconds after it was deployed. Subsequently, shield starts taking more damage, up to maximum of %s after being deployed for %s seconds. Shield starts to gain charge after shield was disabled for %s second and returns to fully charged state after %s seconds.

name: Voltage Regulation System
desc:
Reduces beam weapons flux cost by %s.
Reduces beam weapon range by %s.

name: Weapon Inhibitor
desc:
Reduces ballistic weapon flux generated by %s.
Reduces ballistic weapon damage by %s.
Reduces ballistic weapon rate of fire by %s.
